alert.note: Alert for Republic (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 9:13PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Republic County through 1000 PM CDT... At 912 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southwest of Republic, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Belleville, Scandia, Courtland, Cuba, Norway, Republic, Munden, Narka and Agenda. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for north central Kansas.
